price_objection.objection: These are too expensive / I can find cheaper shoes elsewhere

price_objection.authentic_response: I understand - shoes are an investment. Let's talk about what you need these shoes to do. fit_uncertainty.authentic_response: That's the right question to ask - you can't know for sure in 5 minutes. That's why we have [RETURN POLICY]. Wear them around your house for [TIMEFRAME]. fit_uncertainty.avoid: Guaranteeing comfort, overselling, dismissing legitimate concern
